title: Online Learning Engagement Strategies with Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and High School-Level Social Science Knowledge
context.additional_context: Students participate in a 5-day intensive workshop using digital devices, conducting collaborative projects with generative AI tools.

learning_goals: Students will utilize generative AI-provided personalized learning materials to autonomously design self-directed learning plans.
Students will improve the logical coherence of social science project reports by at least 20% through AI-based real-time feedback.
Students will overcome linguistic barriers and propose effective collaboration strategies with team members using AI translation/writing tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
